data.name: XChartDataArray
desc: gives access to data represented as an array of rows.
Can be obtained from interface XChartDocument via method getData().
If used for an XYDiagram, the row number 0 represents the x-values.

methods.name: getColumnDescriptions
desc: retrieves the description texts for all columns.

methods.name: getData
desc: retrieves the numerical data as a nested sequence of values.

methods.name: getRowDescriptions
desc: retrieves the description texts for all rows.

methods.name: setColumnDescriptions
desc: sets the description texts for all columns.

methods.name: setData
desc: sets the chart data as an array of numbers.

methods.name: setRowDescriptions
desc: sets the description texts for all rows.
